etymology.description: 度(度) (dù, "spend") + 假(假) (jià, "holiday") = to spend time on a holiday
etymology.interpretation: The word 度假(度假) (dùjià, "to go on vacation") literally means spending time during a holiday period. It suggests taking a break from regular activities to rest and relax.

examples.chinese: 我计划度假(我計劃度假)。
examples.english: I plan to go on vacation.

examples.chinese: 暑假期间我们会度假(暑假期間我們會度假)，享受阳光与沙滩(享受陽光與沙灘)。
examples.pinyin: Shǔjià qíjiān wǒmen huì dù jià, xiǎngshòu yángguāng yǔ shātān.
examples.english: During summer vacation, we will go on vacation, enjoying the sunshine and the beach.
